name: somanywhales
text: no way

name: 1000hz
text: A comment left by 1000hz was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by cameasiam, Kleptonis, Crater12)

name: 1000hz
text:
(dang)

Just like old times.

name: haradaya
text: A comment left by haradaya was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by prolefeed5, straw, daidai, king_of_pwns, NDCaesar, nipsy43, Crater12, regrepsnefpoh, Doc_Rostov, Panserbjorne)

name: haradaya
text: A comment left by haradaya was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by king_of_pwns, Sweetlips, Rachelskirts)

name: rowboat
text: You are the guy who talks about getting lamed.

name: billyamericana
text: One wonders if being profoundly stoned and playing sports is something of a recurring theme in the Onstad household. Perhaps on his child's 18th they will burn one and go curling at an ice rink while people fall down due to both their lack of skill and a giant polished granite rock smashing their legs from under them. Good times.

name: chaesar
text: The dude is a native Californian, it is most entirely possible.

name: rowboat
text: You don't have to be a native Californian (or a Californian of any sort) to enjoy sports while profoundly stoned. Just ask me.

name: bixschmix
text: Or any of my friends in college.

name: unquotable
text: Ether bowling

name: boredom_man
text: Crystal meth racquetball.

name: tellumo
text: LSD baseball

name: i_love_kate
text: Crack Waterpolo is one of the deadliest sports known to man.

name: djwhiterabbit
text:
i seen someone get all ill from just weed - after a literal five-foot long bong hit. dude was a pro, but after that he was all green as pistachio and lost it like a rookie cop at a triple homicide.

good night mr. lemahieu, wherever you are.

name: apocowarg
text: Not sure it qualifies but my friend Jody puked after getting high and watching the lawnmower scene in Dead Alive (aka Braindead). He generally does not vomit during horror movies.

name: zeal
text: I ralphed after entirely too much weed via gravity bong.  Just sucking a bowl's worth of smoke into my lungs in one go, several times.  The room just starts spinning too fast, it's too much to take.

name: paco
text: Guy I know puked after smoking his first time. No reason, just threw up.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
I occasionally puke a little when I smoke in the morning, just as a result of getting a death hit and coughing so much my gag reflex kicks in.

It's not good times.

name: paco
text:
yeah man, I threw up for the first time about a week ago . . . as I was smoking my throat kinda dryed up, and got coated with mucus, till I wasn't getting enough air, like 3/4 as much as I needed with each breath . . then my diaphragm started heaving, and I threw up four times.

The funny thing is, it cleaned my throat out, and I still felt great afterwards.

name: onepapertiger
text:
This exactly explains what happened my second time:

Outside on a hot September afternoon, not in a secure basement with excited friends at midnight like the first time but in an uptight neighborhood on a back patio at like 2:30 PM with a friend and three people I didn't know. Girl didn't offer any water, starting fucking with my head after her mom and her grandmother came home like half an hour into it. "What? No, she's not home." *Concerned face* "Are you feeling all right, Steve?" Cheap cigar skin all tore up my throat, trying to manage a seltzer burp, real hungry and confused with the cool kids, Are her mom and grandmother home how long is this gonna last goddammit I have school tomorrow oh this was such a bad idea I don't wanna be high anymore bruurr... Burr-UM-PAULGGHH *splash*

Afternoon was thirstiest performance, played on Schroedinger's ugliest guitar.

name: onepapertiger
text:
This exactly explains what happened my second time:

Outside on a hot September afternoon, not in a secure basement with excited friends at midnight like the first time but in an uptight neighborhood on a back patio at like 2:30 PM with a friend and three people I didn't know. Girl didn't offer any water, starting fucking with my head after her mom and her grandmother came home like half an hour into it. "What? No, she's not home." *Concerned face* "Are you feeling all right, Steve?" Cheap cigar skin all tore up my throat, trying to manage a seltzer burp, real hungry and confused with the cool kids, Are her mom and grandmother home how long is this gonna last goddammit I have school tomorrow oh this was such a bad idea I don't wanna be high anymore bruurr... Burr-UM-PAULGGHH *splash*

Afternoon was thirstiest performance, played on Schroedinger's ugliest guitar.

name: miku224
text: That movie can catch you off guard.  I own it, I've seen it countless times, but the last time I watched it I totally lost control during the pudding scene.

name: apocowarg
text: The pudding scene marked the single most disgusting thing I had ever seen in a movie. It has since been surpassed by scenes from other movies but I will always remember it fondly.

name: miku224
text:
Man, I'm tempted to ask what has been worse, but I'm gonna be strong and not do it.

Seriously though you should tell me.

name: apocowarg
text: After thinking about it I may have spoke too soon. Nothing really compares to the first watch-through of Dead Alive. The last twenty minutes of Audition are pretty rough and the unrated version of Ichi the Killer is pretty brutal. Meet the Feebles disturbed me in a major way but still I think Dead Alive tops them all.

name: straw
text: 5'd for having had this completely happen to me

name: closefriend
text: Driving stoned is the stupidest thing I've ever done, and yet I regret nothing.

name: songbirdspectre
text:
i do it all the time. it is much easier than being drunk.

do not drive drunk, the people on tv know what they are talking about.

name: chrissketch
text: Some people find that they can drive when high. Honestly I don't feel comfortable doing it. Definitely not recommended if you tend towards anxiety. Hell driving whilst intoxicated in general is not really ever a good idea.

name: rowboat
text: When I'm stoned driving on the highway I can go two hundred miles without looking at the road or thinking about what I'm doing. It seems extremely efficient and it makes for a pleasant enough ride (another side effect is that I never break 60 mph), but it's probably not a good thing.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: I rode as a passenger (while high) in a car with a woman (first problem am I right hahaha oh I kill me) who was also high, and that crazy bitch started driving in the opposing traffic lane straight toward an oncoming car and I had to wrench the wheel away from her and goddammit I'm never getting in a car with a stoned woman ever again.

name: swatson
text:
(I hit chubby insted of reply but I do not regret the chubby)

I rode in the back of a taxi stoned. It was like being on a roller coaster where everything was purple.
and life was AMAZING.

name: rowboat
text: Um, I was just talking about weed, dude. I've never tried heroin.

name: swatson
text: Hahaha! It was BC bud! (just weeeeeed.)

name: foetus_punch
text: I live in BC and our bud is nothing special. Side note: despite my distaste for that most noxious of intoxicating weeds, marijuana, I have found my reflexes and instincts are hugely improved. I've never driven stoned, but I assume I would be great at it. I am frankly amazing at stoned video games.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Chubbied for maintaining the misogyny 'til the end.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: No kidding.  I have such difficulty hitting the speed limit when I'm blazed.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Yes, Ray, I believe it is illegal to leave stone people lyin' around in public.

name: evolume
text: In the old days, I used to throw up every time, but it wasn't from the weed.  It was from eating like, the entire bag of chili cheese Frito's.

name: mattylite
text: You just said the magic words.  The magic words are "chili," "cheese," and "fritos," in that order.  They truly are the limit.

name: songbirdspectre
text: Nightlife speaks in italics. [i]I love it.

name: jesler729
text:
Oh man Roast Beef

Eyes all wide

All clutching the steering wheel tightly with both hands

name: pitseleh
text: Instant 5 for Ray's first line.

name: lawbot
text: You're completely HIGH AS HELL!

name: paperboy_2000
text:
Ray would make an awesome EMT. Ambulance rolls up to the scene, sirens wailing. Ray jumps out of the door holding his medical kit before the vehicle has even come to a complete stop. He rushes to the victim, clearing a path through the crowd of onlookers. He kneels over the stricken person, looks him in the eyes, and asks, "You're lying in the middle of the sidewalk, and you're turning blue. How come? "

Meanwhile, Beef waits in the back of the van because he's "basically in no condition to deal with situations of mortality. What if I try to open his shirt to take his vitals and his wallet drops out of a coat pocket? Falls open to reveal pictures of the man's wife and three kids, all looking up at me with their eyes asking 'When is daddy coming home?'"

I could totally go for a version of Emergency! with Ray and Beef working alongside John and Roy.

name: tonyhighwind
text: I am out of chubbies.  Just imagine your count as whatever it is plus one.

name: naminator01
text: A comment left by naminator01 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, aliiis, Zem, Tragic_Johnson, dropkickpikachu)

name: i_love_kate
text: Why are they silhouettes for the last four panels?

name: dovey
text: It's art

name: ovenface
text: to signify that ray and nightlife are completely oblivious to what is really happening- that beef is no longer on the ground but making a getaway in the golf cart.

name: blarghamagarky
text: because they are smokin dope and it's fucking Nightlife Mingus. Dude turns most things into silhouettes. Silhouettes are jazzy.

name: the_stoned_one
text:
HOLY SHIT MAN!!!
i was just burning one and totally didnt notice that they were silhouettes
kinda appropriate forgetfulness on my part i'd venture

name: cagliostro
text:
It seems like it makes you see the strip from Beef's perspective, almost.

You know if you're in a semi-conscious drunken (/stoned?) stupor and people in the room are talking about you? 'Whoa how much has he had', 'Let's draw a moustache on him', and so forth? And it's like, you can hear them, but they're a long way away and what they're talking about is no real concern of yours? It's the visual equivalent of that. Hence Beef NOT being in silhouette at the end. I reckon.

name: mikeronomicon
text: As far as I'm concerned, the best sports ARE the ones you can play while profoundly baked.

name: sweetlips
text:
That must be PCP...and PCP is one hell of a drug...

I bit my mom.

name: shirt145
text: I don't want to go on the cart!

name: dancemanleo
text: Im overly certain if beef can roadtrip cross country in a vintage powermachine, he can drive a cart after one toke one the devils salad

name: brokeaccount
text: I have never noticed this before but Ray's glasses look kind of fucked up here. He is lookin' like a dog.

name: greenkoolayd
text: one doober hit gets you  completely high as hell?  [[ponders]] interesting...
